class.name: TranslationServer
class.description: Server that manages all translations. Translations can be set to it and removed from it.

method.name: add_translation
method.description: Adds a [Translation] resource.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the server from all translations.

method.name: get_loaded_locales
method.description: Returns an Array of all loaded locales of the game.

method.name: get_locale
method.description: Returns the current locale of the game.

method.name: get_locale_name
method.description: Returns a locale's language and its variant (e.g. [code]"en_US"[/code] would return [code]"English (United States)"[/code]).

method.name: get_pseudolocalization_expansion_ratio
method.description: Returns the [code]expansion_ratio[/code] to be used during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: get_pseudolocalization_prefix
method.description: Returns the Prefix that will be used during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: get_pseudolocalization_suffix
method.description: Returns the Suffix that will be used during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: get_translation_object
method.description: Returns the [Translation] instance based on the [code]locale[/code] passed in. It will return a [code]nullptr[/code] if there is no [Translation] instance that matches the [code]locale[/code].

method.name: is_pseudolocalization_accents_enabled
method.description: Returns a boolean suggesting whether the option to replace characters with accented variants during Pseudolocalization is enabled.

method.name: is_pseudolocalization_double_vowels_enabled
method.description: Returns a boolean suggesting whether the option to double vowels of Pseudolocalization is enabled.

method.name: is_pseudolocalization_enabled
method.description: Returns a boolean suggesting whether Pseudolocalization is enabled.

method.name: is_pseudolocalization_fake_bidi_enabled
method.description: Returns a boolean suggesting whether the fake_bidi option of Pseudolocalization is enabled.

method.name: pseudolocalize
method.description: Returns the pseudolocalized string based on the [code]p_message[/code] passed in.

method.name: remove_translation
method.description: Removes the given translation from the server.

method.name: set_locale
method.description: Sets the locale of the game.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_accents_enabled
method.description: Sets the boolean option to replace characters with accented variants during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_double_vowels_enabled
method.description: Sets the boolean option to double vowels during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_enabled
method.description: Turns Pseudolocalization on or off based on the argument [code]enabled[/code].

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_expansion_ratio
method.description: Sets the [code]expansion_ratio[/code] to be used during Pseudolocalization.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_fake_bidi_enabled
method.description: Sets the fake_bidi boolean option of Pseudolocalization.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_prefix
method.description: Sets the [code]prefix[/code] to be used in Pseudolocalization.

method.name: set_pseudolocalization_suffix
method.description: Sets the [code]suffix[/code] to be used in Pseudolocalization.

method.name: translate
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message (key) and context.

method.name: translate_plural
method.description: Returns the current locale's translation for the given message (key), plural_message and context. The number [code]n[/code] is the number or quantity of the plural object. It will be used to guide the translation system to fetch the correct plural form for the selected language.
